Want to read Tamil Bible And Not Knowing to read?

Introducing first ever exclusive Tanglish Bible app for Androind and IOS which will help you to read Tamil bible in English, not only that you can access multiple features which makes app usage very exciting...

READ TAMIL BIBLE IN

Tanglish Version

It gives us immense pleasure to present Tanglish Bible i.e. Romanized Version of Tamil Bible which will help you to read Tamil Bible in English. Not only that we have added multiple features which will help you to easily do multiple tasks.

Tamil Bible

Our Features

  • Offline app

    Tanglish Bible is a complete offline app which can be used without any internet connections, except audio bible.

  • Add Notes

    With our application you can create Notes dynamically and locally, also you can view the notes at any time

  • Bookmark Verse

    You can bookmark verses on the go and can be checked later in a seperate screen which can help you to hold on your choice.

  • Listen on Reading

    In Tanglish Bible we have embeded a feature whcih helps you to listen audio bible parellely while you are reading.

Get for free now!

Available on iOS and Android
